threaten: : "You like your family? I sure do. That's a threat, not a compliment...nevermind."
: "You are making me angry....you do not wanna see me when I'm angry..."
: "Oh buddy...watch it before the alpha wolf comes out..."
: "You're never going to see your favorite show ever again at this rate."
: "I'm gonna rip your nails out one by one buddy...I think it would be painful."
: "What's your problem man? You want a broken kneecap?"
: "Don't make me get the drill out...I definitely know how to use it..."
: "Maybe you need a little convincing for when we set you free...*psst, we are setting them free, right boss?*"
bribe: : "Maybe you need a little convincing for when we set you free...*psst, we are setting them free, right boss?*"
: "I'll make it rain on you if you speak up..."
: "You ever seen a benjamin in your life, buddy?"
: "Listen to me rub this money in my hands it's so satisfying..."
: "I'm loaded buddy, tell me what I want and I'll share it."
bribeSuccess: Captive: "Well hell yeah I'll tell ya!"
bribeFail: Captive: "Yeah, gonna need more than that, buddy."
talk: : "Tell me what I need to know, NOW! Please."
: "Could you tell me now, por favor?"
: "I know you want to get out of this, just talk."
: "Do you enjoy being tortured? I'll keep going...it's kinda fun. Or you can talk."
: "I love talking, do you love talking?"
: "Um. Could you please tell me now?"
talkSuccess: Captive: "Fine, I'll tell you whatever you need to know...."
